name: TikTok IOS App UI Kit
description:
TikTok iOS app UI Kit 1.4

The goal of this project is to recreate the entire TikTok mobile application, this is only a draft for now. It contains a limited number of components of the application. Feel free to use it in any of your projects! For the font, I advise you to use a variant of Proxima Nova like here. This project is not official


Changelog:


Version 1.4 22/03/2022 :

  • Added component “Profile Picture (PP)” for stories on the profile page
  • Fixed “Profile Picture” component not
  • appearing correctly on some components
  • Fixed “Go to main component library” button appearing on all the components of the screens mockups (to be fixed in the next release)
  • Added story page
  • Cleaned up the project
  • Redesigned the cover page: Added roadmap and suggestions
  • Changed the version system 0.1.4 -> 1.4


Version 0.1.3 29/01/2022 :

  • Changed Discover icon on the navigation bar according to TikTok update
  • Added "Discover" application page
  • Added 2 new icons
  • General improvements
  • Complete overhaul of the Cover page


Version 0.1.2 25/12/2021 :

  • Added "Profile info" component
  • Added "Profile" application page
  • Added several icons including "Bell" and "Link" icon
  • Reorganization in several pages of the project: Cover 📙, Components 🔶, Application pages 📲
  • Project "cleaned" up in general
  • Complete overhaul of the Icons page.
  • Added an advice at the cover page
